summary: DROVE VEHICLE APPROXIMATELY 25 MILES OVER FLAT LAND, NO HILLS OR MOUNTAINS, TO DUMP WASTE WATER. WHEN WE WENT TO LEFT REAR OF RV TO OPEN SEWER ACCESS, SMELLED STRONG SCENT OF BURNING BRAKE FLUID AND COULD DETECT HEAT FROM WHEEL WELL. ALLOWED BRAKES AMPLE TIME TO COOL DOWN THEN DROVE HOME WITHOUT INCIDENT. BRAKE SMELL WAS DIMINISHED WHEN ARRIVED AT HOME. DRIVE VEHICLE SHORT DISTANCES ONLY THREE TIMES SINCE THEN, WITHOUT INCIDENT.  *TR

WHEN THE CONSUMER MADE A TURN, THE BRAKE LIGHT CAME ON AND SECONDS LATER THE BRAKES LOCKED. AS A RESULT THE PARKING BRAKE AND THE ELECTRIC BRAKES FAILED. THE DEALER STATES THE BRAKES INADEQUATE FOR THE MOTOR HOME. THE CAUSE HAS YET TO BE DETERMINED. PLEASE PROVIDE ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.  *JB
